sentences.en: But in softball, the pitcher must throw the ball underhand.
sentences.cn: 但垒球的投手必须使用下手投法.

sentences.en: For beginners, I recommend the underhand serve. For experienced players I recommend the overhand floater serve.
sentences.cn: 对初学者来说, 我建议发下手球, 对有一定训练经验的我建议发上手飘球.

sentences.en: He got the money in a very underhand manner.
sentences.cn: 他用极为狡诈的手段弄到了这笔钱.

sentences.en: However, nothing they offered would induce him and in desperation they stooped to more underhand methods.
sentences.cn: 但他们的报价丝毫没能打动他,绝望之中他们被逼得使出迂回之术.

sentences.en: However, the grenades do have a new secondary function - an underhand toss.
sentences.cn: 但是, 手雷有个新特点 - 不过肩扔投.

sentences.en: I don't believe in getting what by underhand method.
sentences.cn: 我认为以不光明的手法获取想要得到的东西是不应该的.

sentences.en: I would never have expected her to behave in such an underhand way.
sentences.cn: 我从未想到她的行为竟如此阴险。

sentences.en: In softball, pitches are tossed underhand.
sentences.cn: 垒球运动中采用低手投球。

sentences.en: It is a sneaky and underhand way of doing business.
sentences.cn: 这种做生意的方式偷偷摸摸，遮遮掩掩。

sentences.en: They did it all in such an underhand way.
sentences.cn: 这一切他们都进行得如此隐秘。

sentences.en: Underhand work of that sort is against the grain with me.
sentences.cn: 这种欺诈的勾当跟我格格不入.
